entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 2:42 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
